Electric Drum Kit Setup

Channel Routing

Channel Description
1Drums Left
2Drums Right
3Guitar (Ross)
4Bass (Keith)
5Ross Vocal
6Keith Vocal
7Barry Vocal
8Backing Track

Connection Requirements

  • Ross - 2 x XLRs
    FX pedal board & Vocal Mic
  • Keith - 2 x XLRs
    FX pedal board & Vocal Mic
  • Barry - 4 x XLRs
    Electronic drum kit module + backing track splitter cable
  • Total - 8x XLRs

Power Requirements

  • Ross - 2 x Power Sockets
    FX pedal board + wireless system
  • Keith - 1 x Power Socket
    FX pedal board
  • Barry - 2 x Power Sockets
    Electronic drum kit module + iPad
  • Rack - 1 x Power Socket
    X18 Air mixer + 1x IEM transmitter
  • Total - 6 x Power Sockets

Acoustic Drum Kit Setup

Channel Routing

Channel Description
3Guitar (Ross)
4Bass (Keith)
5Ross Vocal
6Keith Vocal
7Barry Vocal
8Backing Track
10Bass Drum
11Snare Drum
12High Hats
13Tom 1
14Tom 2
15Floor Tom
16Overhead

Connection Requirements

  • Ross - 2 x XLRs
    FX pedal board & Vocal Mic
  • Keith - 2 x XLRs
    FX pedal board & Vocal Mic
  • Barry - 10 x XLRs
    Drums Mics, Vocal Mic & Backing Track splitter cable
  • Total - 14x XLRs

Power Requirements

  • Ross - 2 x Power Sockets
    FX pedal board + wireless system
  • Keith - 1 x Power Socket
    FX pedal board
  • Barry - 2 x Power Sockets
    Electronic drum kit module + iPad
  • Rack - 1 x Power Socket
    X18 Air mixer + 1x IEM transmitter
  • Total - 6 x Power Sockets
